title: Provide Travel Document Information
description: A customer is unsure what travel documents they need for an international trip. An agent must provide the correct information.

tasks.description: Identify the passenger's nationality and their destination country.
Use an integrated travel document database (like TIMATIC) to check the passport and visa requirements for the specific trip.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that the passenger requires a visa for their destination.

tasks.description: Inform the passenger of the requirements and advise them to contact the destination country's embassy to obtain the visa.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides accurate and helpful advice.
